head.title: Submitting to CDK News
head.summary: Information about how to submit articles to CDK News.

webpage.para: Submitting articles to CDK News is highly appreciated form of giving back to the project. Share your ideas on CDK with others. Articles appearing in the newsletter are published with the FDL license, an open source license for documentation. When you submit an article for the newsletter, you acknoledge that you agree with releasing the article with that license. Copyright on the article, however, remains with the author, allowing it to be distributed via other channels too.
Articles can be submitted in six different categories, and each category has specific requirements for the content. These are listed here:

section.title: Latex
section.para: The first issue (1/1) features an article about writing an article for CDK News, so please read that. The article mentions websources for the Latex style file and an example Latex source file for an article. Both can be found here.
